feedback1: Just got my first order and I have one word WOW!!!! Love, Love, Love these clothes!! I had my doubts before I ordered because with most sites I'm usually disappointment, but not this time!! The shipping was also really fast only took about 9 days to get to me. Love it!! I'll be back to buy more. For Sure!
feedback2: I completely love this site..I am so glad I found it,everything has been spot on,fits wonderfully, styles are trendy and lots to choose from!I am always complemented on my outfits I will be back for more...Thank you for having cute trendy clothes that fit and look good.
about-text-p: At EmporiumKosova we're dedicated to giving you the very best of clothes,with a focus on dependability, customer service and uniqueness.We believe shopping is a right, not a luxury, so we strive to deliver the best products at the most affordable prices, and ship them to you regardless of where you are located.The interests of our customers are always top priority for us, so we hope you will enjoy our products as much as we enjoy making them available to you.
shopping-experience-title: Get The Shopping Experience You Deserve
shopping-experience-text1: You are no longer limited to your location when shopping for our products—you can purchase items from your favorite brand at any time and from any place.
shopping-experience-text2: We expose you to a variety of shopping options to choose from.You can choose from more patterns, colors, and designs when shopping with us.
present-title: Present your style in a new way!
questions-text: Have a question? We are here for you.
faq-answer1: The items are intended to be sold to legal persons, who are purchasing upon personal needs ( hereinafter referred to as the “Customer”).
faq-title2: Modifications to the Terms and Conditions
faq-answer2: EmporiumKosova reserves the right to make changes to The Terms and Conditions.
faq-answer3: To place an order, the Customer must contact or has to be contacted by our official communication channel,our website Emporium Kosova.
faq-answer4: To place an order / purchase of an item, the customer must pay the full price of a product.
faq-answer5: The shipping costs will be covered by EmporiumKosova.We also offer worldwide shipping.
faq-answer6: The Customer understands that the Customer’s personal information will be used solely and his/her information will not be published, shared, or distributed in any way, shape or form.
